title: Refunding my Nightbringer Yasuo Icon and border
body: I purchased the nightbringer Yasuo Icon And Border by purchasing 2,     140 chaos tokens with RP. What I didn't know was that the border only worked IF I had the particular skin. I do not have anymore refunds on my account, and I request that I get a refund for both these purchases as they aren't what I thought they were. I would really appreciate it if I could, thank you.

replies.body: I have the same problem, I purchased the riven Icon and border and I did not know that you would ONLY get the border if you had a certain skin equipped along side the icon. This is not fair, as nowhere does it mention this is required. All it says is Icon and Border. On top of that, even though I have refunds the item is non-refundable, which is also not fair. I also request that I get a refund for this icon as I spent 5 dollars on it. Thank you.
